text: I need the report by 3pm today. Don't be late this time.
Nobody told me about the meeting change. You need to keep me in the loop. This is unacceptable.
My computer crashed again. Fix it immediately. I've already complained about this three times and nothing has been done.
Why hasn't my vacation request been approved yet? I submitted it two weeks ago. This is ridiculous.
The deadline was yesterday and half of you still haven't submitted your parts. Get it done today or we're all in trouble.
The conference room was a mess this morning. Someone needs to clean it before my 2pm meeting. This keeps happening.
You made an error on my expense report again. Check the receipts I attached and fix it.
The graphics you sent are wrong. I specifically said blue not green. Do you even read my emails? Redo them by noon.
I can't work this weekend. Find someone else to cover the shift.
The client is furious because nobody returned their call. Who dropped the ball on this? I want answers.
